message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_ENDREASON_EMPTY
message.locale: An end reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELAT_XRV_END_DATE
message.locale: The Relationship end date must be before "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELAT_XRV_START_DATE
message.locale: The Relationship start date must be after "%1s" start date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELATEDEMPLOYER_EMPTY
message.locale: You must choose a related company.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELATEDPERSON_EMPTY
message.locale: You must choose a related person.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: This relationship is invalid as a Parent-Child relationship already exists.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_RNFE_ALTERNATE_ID
message.locale: A Concern Role cannot be found with the ID supplied.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XFV_PERSON_RELATSELF
message.locale: You cannot create a relationship for this household member with themselves.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XFV_EMPLOYER_RELATSELF
message.locale: An Employer cannot be related to itself.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XFV_PROSPEMPLOYER_RELATSELF
message.locale: A Prospect Employer cannot be related to itself.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLERELATIONSHIP_RNFE_RECIP_RELATION
message.locale: Failed to read existing reciprocal concern role relationship.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELAT_XRV_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Relationship start date must not be earlier than the start date of "%1s" - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELAT_XRV_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Relationship to date must be after "%1s" to date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XFV_REL_START_CR_END
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be later than concern role end date.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XFV_REL_END_CR_END
message.locale: Relationship end date must not be later than concern role end date.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XFV_REL_START_RCR_END
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be later than related concern role end date.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XFV_REL_END_RCR_END
message.locale: Relationship end date must not be later than related concern role end date.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XRV_RCR_TYPE
message.locale: A relationship cannot be created between concern roles of differing types.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_RELATED_PROSPECTEMPLOYER_TRANSFERRED
message.locale: A relationship cannot be created with a prospect employer who is currently registered as an employer.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_RELATED_PROSPECTPERSON_TRANSFERRED
message.locale: A relationship cannot be created with a prospect person who is currently registered as a person.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELATEDPROSPECTPERSON_EMPTY
message.locale: You must choose a related prospect person.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_RELATEDPROSPECTEMPLOYER_EMPTY
message.locale: You must choose a related prospect employer.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New relationship details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Relationship details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Relationship details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEREL_RELATEDCLIENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as a relative to another client.
